seo.title: About Me
seo.description: Who is Bekir Emre Sarıpınar? A look into my passion for technology, software career, and product development vision.

hero.title: A developer adding technical vision to the product ecosystem.
hero.richTitle: A journey fueled by curiosity — a <product>product</product> and <experience>experience</experience>-driven way of building.
hero.lead: I focus on aligning user experience, performance, and accessibility. I build modern interfaces with React + TypeScript and deliver end-to-end solutions when needed with tools like Go and Firebase.

summary.title: Quick Summary
items: I keep building projects alongside my studies
I stay active in social and community work
I enjoy portrait and black & white photography
I keep my mind sharp with a daily reading routine

start.title: How did it start?
start.p1: I met computers when I was just 3 years old. Even before learning to read and write, I memorized typing on the keyboard to access game sites. I was always a curious child, tinkering and asking 'how does this work?'.
start.p2: I wrote my first 'Hello World' in high school, and from that moment on, software turned from a hobby into a goal. I chose Computer Engineering at university to ground this curiosity on a solid foundation.

current.title: What am I doing today?
current.p1: While continuing my studies, I also continue to produce and improve myself in different areas. I nurture my learning not only with classes but also by developing projects, experimenting with new technologies, and staying active in social/community activities.
current.p2: On the technical side, I work on modern web interfaces with React + TypeScript, real-time solutions based on Firebase, performance-oriented services with Go, and bringing product ideas to life end-to-end. Producing solutions for different problems like education, e-commerce, finance, and SaaS broadens my perspective and helps me build better products.

photo.title: Photography enthusiast
photo.text: I especially love shooting portraits and black & white (B&W) frames with my camera.

book.title: Reading routine
book.text: I read a lot; I made it a habit to read for at least 1 hour every day.

people.title: Meeting people
people.text: I love meeting new people and listening to different perspectives.

tea.title: Tea lover
tea.text: I prefer tea over coffee; a good tea break during the day does me good.
